item.title: 5.0" IPS – 800×480 (WVGA)
item.description:
Why choose it

  • Mature ecosystem, easy mechanical integration
  • High brightness option (1,000 nits) for semi-outdoor

Options

  • Strengthened cover lens, anti-smudge coating, lamination.
